projectGridLines.title: Modelling the degradation of lithium-ion batteries, developing data driven approaches to characterize state, diagnose health and predict the lifetime of batteries.
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Data Collection and Preprocessing: Assist in gathering, cleaning, and preprocessing structured and unstructured data from various sources.

Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA): Perform EDA to uncover trends, patterns, and anomalies in the data.

Model Development: Support the development of statistical and machine learning models for predictive analytics, classification, clustering, etc.

Data Visualization: Create visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights to technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Documentation: Document processes, methodologies, and findings to ensure reproducibility and knowledge sharing.

Skill sets: Programming Skills: Proficiency in Python or R, with hands-on experience in data manipulation, analysis, and visualization libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn).

Statistical Knowledge: Understanding of basic statistical concepts and methods (e.g., hypothesis testing, regression analysis).

Machine Learning Basics: Familiarity with machine learning concepts and frameworks (e.g., Scikit-learn, TensorFlow). 

Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure)

Traits expectation: Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to a non-technical audience.

Expected learning: Mentorship from experienced data scientists, researchers and other professionals.

Opportunity to work on real-world projects that have a direct impact on the business.

Access to company resources, tools, and training m
